Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Wakeforest Drive, just south of the Oceancrest Circle.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the brilliance of the Oceancrest Circle to the north. It was designed to be a powerful symbol of the unity and power in Oceancrest, and the pride the people take in living and working in such a city. The Circle was built and privately funded by the citizens of Oceancrest and then donated to the City.
